# recipients

**Instance Property**

The contacts who are the recipients of the messages.

## Declaration

```swift
var recipients: [INPerson]? { get }
```

## Discussion

When this property contains one or more [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPerson] objects, your search should return only messages received by the specified users. Use the operator in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMessagesIntent/recipientsOperator] property to determine whether to search for messages containing all, some, or none of the specified recipients.

## Getting the Senders and Recipients

- **recipientsOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the recipients in the search criteria.
- **senders**: The senders to include or exclude when you search for messages.
- **sendersOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the senders in the search criteria.
- **speakableGroupNames**: The names of any groups associated with the message.
- **speakableGroupNamesOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the group names in the search criteria.
